speaker.name: Piotr Rybak
speaker.biography: Piotr Rybak is a Machine Learning Researcher with experience in industry and academia. In his work, he mainly focuses on Natural Language Understanding but once in a while, he likes to dive into other topics. In his free time, he's a big fan of board games, Lego bricks, and boulder climbing.
speaker.affiliation: WrocÅ‚aw University of Science and Technology
